version_description: Fixed issues preventing some players from logging in.

• Fixed an issue with the Galaxies Pass+ button, it should do its job better now.
• Fixed an issue with pop-up messages in the client, we really want you to see important notices.
• Fixed an issue where some devices weren't patching properly.
• Fixed an issue where some languages could not be typed.

• We've made some changes to the way phone keyboards work. You shouldn't notice any difference unless things get better, in which case: You're Welcome.
• Mysterious account errors during login have been unmasked and destroyed. Begone!
• When you've completed all your available missions you will see a fun little pengu friend instead of...a bunch of completed missions you didn't care about.
• No more mysterious enemy missing pings. Or any pings, why did we even have pings?

• Small improvements to the friends panel.
• Fixed a bug where some players needed to patch every time they restarted the app.
• You should now see a message when something goes wrong.
• Fixed drop tables displaying the wrong numbers.
• Fixed bugs and made improvements to loadouts.
• Emotes can now be placed in multiple slots.
• Fixed issues with aspect ratio & resolution resizing.
• Tuned the login and home screen music.
• All the controls & tabs & such now also make sounds.

● Faster Loadouts screen equipping.
● “Login Successful” SFX fixes.
● Logging out no longer resets your setup.
● Arena Skins Icons zoomed out.
● You can now remove a friend.
● Fixed the (don't) "stay signed in" option.
● Fixed stage indicator bugs.
● Little Legends rarity now shows in loadouts.
● Ready Check indicator and Social Panel visual fixes.
● Expired missions no longer appear.
● Social Auth accounts can now access inventory when first logging in.
● Fixed crashes with the trait panel in Team Planner.

-General drag and drop improvements. Moving Champions and equipping items should feel better.
-Increased the size and usability of the emote panel.
-Tutorial and Ranked game icon status colors will now show appropriately.
-Fixed issues causing crashes between the ready check and loading screen.
-Fixed case sensitivity for Greek in the Loadouts search bar.
-Removed the sounds of chat coming from your noisy neighborhood PC players.
-You can now see your equipped items during the carousel round.

-General drag and drop improvements. Moving Champions and equipping items should feel better.
-Increased the size and usability of the emote panel.
-Tutorial and Ranked game icon status colors will now show appropriately.
-Fixed issues causing crashes between the ready check and loading screen.
-Fixed case sensitivity for Greek in the Loadouts search bar.
-Removed the sounds of chat coming from your noisy neighborhood PC players.
-You can now see your equipped items during the carousel round.
We squashed a few bugs and made performance improvements so you can focus on the fun.

-The Team Planner is now available throughout the app! Build your dream team before you hop into a game, and reference it while playing. Your team will be saved until you quit the app.
-The Store is live. You can purchase board skins, Little Legend eggs, and more! The items are of a limited selection for now, but expect to see new additions in the future.
-Galaxies Mid-Set Update: New Champions, Traits, and Items.
-Void and Valkyrie Champions have been removed.
-Galaxies II Pass is here!
We squashed a few bugs and made performance improvements so you can focus on the fun.

-A few Team Planner bugs needed fixing.
-Xerath was lost in space for a bit. We found him and put him back in the Team Planner.
-We removed a few champions from the game in patch 10.12 but they hid away in the Team Planner. We found and removed them.
-Nocturne snuck into Tier 2 in the Team Planner. We put him back into his appropriate Tier 1.
We squashed a few bugs and made performance improvements so you can focus on the fun.
